CONTENTPLUGIN_ALREADY_EXISTS.description: Plugin already exists with the same name and version

CONTENTPLUGIN_ATTR_CLASH.description: Target attribute already used in another plugin

data.installedFramework: Version of the framework which is installed
data.name: Name of content plugin
data.requiredFramework: Version of the framework which is required

CONTENTPLUGIN_INCOMPAT_FW.description: Plugin incompatible with the installed framework version

data.courses: List of courses using the content plugin

CONTENTPLUGIN_IN_USE.description: Content plugin is in use in existing courses

CONTENTPLUGIN_NEWER_INSTALLED.description: Plugin already exists at a higher version

data.registered: Plugins that do not match their installed version

CONTENTPLUGIN_VERSION_MISMATCH.description: The installed version of a plugin does not match the registered version
